query:
ALTER TABLE player_upgrades
  MODIFY COLUMN badgeName VARCHAR(100) NULL,
  MODIFY COLUMN fromLevel ENUM('none', 'bronze', 'silver', 'gold') NULL,
  MODIFY COLUMN toLevel ENUM('bronze', 'silver', 'gold') NULL;
